item.title: My Favorite Question
item.description: Hey everyone, you’re listening to Uncle Warikoo on Woice with Warikoo. On this podcast I talked to you about entrepreneurship, how to grow in life, manage personal finances, handle failures and a lot more things that just come to my mind.

item.title: Should you be nice or honest
item.description: Hey everyone, you’re listening to Uncle Variku on Voice with Variku. On this podcast I talked to you about entrepreneurship, how to grow in life, manage personal finances, handle failures and a lot more things that just come to my mind.

item.title: Stocks and life
item.description: In this episode I wanted to talk about personal finance but not make it boring so basically extend how personal finance transcends personal finance and enters into our life beyond just money.
